item.description:
Dear Boston Karaoke Meetup Members:

I am very excited to announce our next Karaoke Meetup for October 16 2010! It's at the Courtside Restaurant and Pub in Cambridge MA where we have held many Meetups in the past. It's close to public transportation and parking is plentiful.

Courtside has an excellent selection of over 20,000 songs and many large screens for viewing lyrics. Whatever kind of music you enjoy, there will be something for you.

Our group is ideal for beginners as well as experienced singers. If you are new to Karaoke or just want to listen to the others sing, please feel free to join us. There will be no pressure for you to sing until you feel ready.

If you can't wait to grab that microphone, then you will feel right at home too. You can probably sing 4-5 songs during the course of the evening.

We have the Karaoke Lounge reserved just for us from 7-9PM so please try to get there by 7PM to get the most out of this Meetup.

Please sign up as soon as possible. I look forward to seeing old friends and meeting some new ones.

Regards,
-Phil
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be in the Karaoke Lounge or you can call me at 617-429-6571
item.name: Boston Karaoke Meetup - Saturday 7-9PM on October 16, 2010
